FKE Seminar Series – Prof. Young-Soo Sohn
=========================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Jan 28, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/seminarBMIE01022024-1080x675.jpeg)

Assalamualaikum and Good Day.

Dear postgraduate student, you are cordially invited to attend the talk organized by the faculty. The lecture schedule is as follows.

Speaker: Prof. Young-Soo Sohn  
Title: Sensing amyloid-β42 using a bimetal-based surface plasmon resonance chip for diagnosed Alheimer Disease  
Date: 1st February 2024 (Thursday)  
Time: 9.00 AM  
Venue: Active Learning Classroom, P19a, Level 5

**Attendance will be recorded.**
